start_area.name: City Outskirts
start_area.description: Safe zone. A quiet road leading to the city.

capsule_lobby.name: Capsule Corp Lobby
capsule_lobby.description: The shiny reception of Capsule Corporation. Bulma might be here.

city_center.name: West City Center
city_center.description: Bustling streets with cars flying overhead.

item_shop.name: West City Goods
item_shop.description: A store selling capsules and gear. Type 'buy' to see items.

wasteland_1.name: Rocky Wasteland
wasteland_1.description: Barren rocks and dry earth. Dangerous creatures roam here. Raditz is rumored to be nearby.

wasteland_2.name: Deep Wasteland
wasteland_2.description: Deeper into the wilds. You see a spaceship in the distance.

frieza_landing.name: Alien Landing Site
frieza_landing.description: A large round spaceship is parked here. Soldiers are patrolling. The hatch is open.

frieza_ship_interior.name: Frieza's Ship - Interaction Room
frieza_ship_interior.description: You are inside the ship. The air is cold. A menacing figure sits in a hover chair... no, he is standing now.
